Trustee_10_pre_3.name: Mohammed Al-Farsi
Trustee_10_pre_3.content: Demonstrated a reliable approach to stewardship by ensuring equitable distribution of profits and maintaining transparency throughout the investment process. This behavior reinforces my reputation as a conscientious trustee who values fairness and prioritizes mutual growth.

Investor_10_pre_4.name: Mohammed Al-Farsi
Investor_10_pre_4.content: Throughout the investment process, I demonstrated trustworthiness and a strong commitment to collaboration, actively engaging in the allocation plan and ensuring transparency in our dealings. My focus on mutual growth and benefiting the wider community reflects my pro-social tendencies. I aim to maintain a reputation as a reliable and fair investor.

Investor_10_pre_5.name: Mohammed Al-Farsi
Investor_10_pre_5.content: Throughout the investment process, I have demonstrated trustworthiness, commitment to collaboration, and a focus on mutual growth. I actively engaged in the allocation plan and successfully received a profit return greater than the initial promise, illustrating my dedication to transparency and fairness. My aim is to maintain a positive reputation by ensuring my actions benefit both myself and the broader community.
